---
title: "Match SampleID to reads stats"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
path_bc = "BarcodeToSample_Clavel.txt"
path_nanostat = "Clavel_multiqc_nanostat.txt"
```

```{r}
bc = read_tsv(path_bc)

reads = read_tsv(path_reads) %>%
  mutate(Sample= str_remove_all(Sample,"_pass"))

reads.per.sample= inner_join(bc,reads,by="Sample")%>% 
  rename(Output_Gb = 'Total bases_fastq') %>% 
  mutate(Output_Gb = Output_Gb/(10^6)) %>% 
  select(InternalID,Sample,'Number of reads_fastq','Read length N50_fastq', 'Output_Gb') 

```

```{r}
head(reads.per.sample)
```

```{r}
write_tsv(x = reads.per.sample,file="reads_per_sample_multiqc_ClavelNanopore_B6.txt")
```
